title: App Development using Dart Programming Language
headline: Learn to use the client-optimized Dart programming language to create applications in this free online course.
description: This course will introduce you to the Dart programming language from its basics, such as the setup process, to advanced concepts like concurrency. In this course, you will learn about console input and output, data types, variables, functions and operators. You will also learn about flow control, exception handling and the different collection types like lists, queues and maps, as well as using classes in Dart.

courseDescription:
This short course covers the Dart programming language and its use in creating applications. We begin by introducing you to the language and the process of setting up the developer environment for Dart programming. We will explore the console input and output tutorials, variables and writing comments. Next, we introduce Dart data types (like strings, numbers and Booleans) and operators like arithmetic, relational and type-test operators. You will analyse flow control, using ‘if’ and ‘switch’ statements, ‘for’ loops and ‘for in’ loops and much more.

The second half of the course begins by explaining the process of creating a basic function and tutorials on function parameters, return values and recursion. Then, we investigate handling exceptions and collection types like lists, maps, Enums, sets and queues. Finally, the course concludes with demonstrations on how to create classes, class constructors, class inheritance and tutorials on advanced concepts like runes, debugging and concurrency.

The Dart programming language is a modern, light and powerful programming language for quickly creating applications for different platforms. This course covers all you need to know to start building apps with the language and is suitable for individuals interested in learning this increasingly popular language. So start now and be on your way to creating applications using Dart in just three hours.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module introduces the course content and covers some common operations in the Dart programming language. You will learn to setup and run Dart, as well as how to print information to the console, and take information from a user. You will also learn about comments, variables, datatypes, and operators in the Dart language.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn how to control the order in which parts of an app's code are executed. You will also learn to create and use functions in the Dart Language. You will learn about if & switch statements, for and while loops, as well as the break and continue statements. You will also learn to handle exceptions with the Dart Language.
topics: Flow Control, Functions & Exception Handling – Learning Outcomes
Flow Control, Functions & Exception Handling – Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will be introduced to various collection types, and classes in the Dart Programming Language. Collections covered include lists, maps, enumerations, sets, queues, and much more. You will also learn about class constructors, class inheritance, method overriding, debugging & Concurrency.

modules.name: Module
topics: App Development using Dart Programming Language – Course assessment
